blocks.name: islnopp
blocks.content: The property for two points ` A ` and ` B ` to lie on the opposite sides of a set ` D ` Definition 9.1 of [Schwabhauser] p. 67. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm islnopp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wa(wa(wn(wcel(c0, c3)), wn(wcel(c2, c3))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, c4, c2))))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cds, c6))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(citv, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, copab(s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(cv(s2), cdif(c5, c3))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wa(wa(wn(wcel(c0, c3)), wn(wcel(c2, c3))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, c4, c2)))))), wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wa(wa(wn(wcel(c0, c3)), wn(wcel(c2, c3))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, c4, c2)))))), wceq(c7, cfv(cds, c6)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wa(wa(wn(wcel(c0, c3)), wn(wcel(c2, c3))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, c4, c2)))))), wceq(c4, cfv(citv, c6)))
  bitr4d(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2), wa(wa(wn(wcel(c0, c3)), wn(wcel(c2, c3))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, c4, c2)))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(c2, cdif(c5, c3))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, c4, c2)))))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(c2, cdif(c5, c3))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, c4, c2))))), wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5))
  brabg(hs0, hs1, c0, c5, c2, c5, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(c2, cdif(c5, c3))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, c4, c2)))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(c5, c3))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1))))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(c5, c3))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, c4, cv(hs1))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(c5, c3))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)))), wa(wcel(c0, cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(c5, c3))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, c4, cv(hs1)))))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(c0, cdif(c5, c3)))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c0, cdif(c5, c3))
  rexbidv(s0, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, c4, cv(hs1))))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), co(c0, c4, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, c4, cv(hs1))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wa(wcel(c0, cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(c5, c3))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, c4, cv(hs1)))), wa(wcel(c0, cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(c2, cdif(c5, c3))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, c4, c2))))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(c0, cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(c2, cdif(c5, c3)))
  eleq1(cv(hs1), c2, cdif(c5, c3))
  rexbidv(s0, c3, wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, c4, cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, c4, c2)))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), co(c0, c4, cv(hs1)), co(c0, c4, c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), c2, c0, c4)
  eqtri(c1, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(c5, c3))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)))))), copab(s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(cv(s2), cdif(c5, c3))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)))))))
  cbvopabv(s1, s2, hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(cv(s2), cdif(c5, c3))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2))))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(c5, c3))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1))))))
  anbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(cv(s2), cdif(c5, c3))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(c5, c3))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)))))
  anbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(cv(s2), cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(c5, c3)))
  eleq1d(cv(s1), cdif(c5, c3), cv(hs0), wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs1))))
  simpl(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs1)))
  eleq1d(cv(s2), cdif(c5, c3), cv(hs1), wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs1))))
  simpr(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs1)))
  rexbidv(s0, c3, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2))), wcel(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1))))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)), co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs1))))
  oveq12(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2), cv(hs1), c4)
  anbi1d(w0, wa(wn(wcel(c0, c3)), wn(wcel(c2, c3))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, c4, c2))), wa(wcel(c0, cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(c2, cdif(c5, c3))))
  anbi12d(w0, wn(wcel(c0, c3)), wn(wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c0, cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(c2, cdif(c5, c3)))
  syl6bbr(w0, wn(wcel(c0, c3)), wcel(c0, cdif(c5, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, c5), wn(wcel(c0, c3))))
  biantrurd(w0, wn(wcel(c0, c3)), wcel(c0, c5))
  eldif(c0, c5, c3)
  syl6bbr(w0, wn(wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c2, cdif(c5, c3)), wa(wcel(c2, c5), wn(wcel(c2, c3))))
  biantrurd(w0, wn(wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c2, c5))
  eldif(c2, c5, c3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(c2, cdif(c5, c3))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, c4, c2)))))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(c2, cdif(c5, c3))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, c4, c2)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(c5, c3))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)))))
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(c5, c3)))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs0), cdif(c5, c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs1), cdif(c5, c3))
  diff.cdif.s(s1, c5, c3)
  diff.wrex.s(s1, s0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1))))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(c5, c3))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)))))
  diff.wa.s(s2, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(c5, c3)))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(hs0), cdif(c5, c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(hs1), cdif(c5, c3))
  diff.cdif.s(s2, c5, c3)
  diff.wrex.s(s2, s0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1))))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.co.s(s2, cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(cv(s2), cdif(c5, c3))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2))))))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c5, c3)), wcel(cv(s2), cdif(c5, c3))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2))))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs1)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s2), cv(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

thm islnopp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[c1]c2 ↔((¬ c0 ∈ c3 ∧ ¬ c2 ∈ c3)∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c3, s0 ∈(c0[c4]c2)))))
  ⊣ c5 =(Base ` c6)
  ⊣ c7 =(dist ` c6)
  ⊣ c4 =(Itv ` c6)
  ⊣ c1 = { < s1, s2 > |((s1 ∈(c5 \ c3)∧ s2 ∈(c5 \ c3))∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c3, s0 ∈(s1[c4]s2)))}
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
  ⊣ d(s2, c5)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[c1]c2 ↔((¬ c0 ∈ c3 ∧ ¬ c2 ∈ c3)∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c3, s0 ∈(c0[c4]c2))))), c5 =(Base ` c6))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[c1]c2 ↔((¬ c0 ∈ c3 ∧ ¬ c2 ∈ c3)∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c3, s0 ∈(c0[c4]c2))))), c7 =(dist ` c6))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[c1]c2 ↔((¬ c0 ∈ c3 ∧ ¬ c2 ∈ c3)∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c3, s0 ∈(c0[c4]c2))))), c4 =(Itv ` c6))
  bitr4d(w0, c0[c1]c2, ((¬ c0 ∈ c3 ∧ ¬ c2 ∈ c3)∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c3, s0 ∈(c0[c4]c2))), ((c0 ∈(c5 \ c3)∧ c2 ∈(c5 \ c3))∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c3, s0 ∈(c0[c4]c2))))
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[c1]c2 ↔((c0 ∈(c5 \ c3)∧ c2 ∈(c5 \ c3))∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c3, s0 ∈(c0[c4]c2)))), c0 ∈ c5, c2 ∈ c5)
  brabg(hs0, hs1, c0, c5, c2, c5, c1, ((c0 ∈(c5 \ c3)∧ c2 ∈(c5 \ c3))∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c3, s0 ∈(c0[c4]c2))), ((hs0 ∈(c5 \ c3)∧ hs1 ∈(c5 \ c3))∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c3, s0 ∈(hs0[c4]hs1))), ((c0 ∈(c5 \ c3)∧ hs1 ∈(c5 \ c3))∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c3, s0 ∈(c0[c4]hs1))))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, (hs0 ∈(c5 \ c3)∧ hs1 ∈(c5 \ c3)), ∃(s0 ∈ c3, s0 ∈(hs0[c4]hs1)), (c0 ∈(c5 \ c3)∧ hs1 ∈(c5 \ c3)), ∃(s0 ∈ c3, s0 ∈(c0[c4]hs1)))
  anbi1d(hs0 = c0, hs0 ∈(c5 \ c3), hs1 ∈(c5 \ c3), c0 ∈(c5 \ c3))
  eleq1(hs0, c0, (c5 \ c3))
  rexbidv(s0, c3, hs0 = c0, s0 ∈(hs0[c4]hs1), s0 ∈(c0[c4]hs1))
  eleq2d(s0, (hs0[c4]hs1), (c0[c4]hs1), hs0 = c0)
  oveq1(hs0, c0, c4, hs1)
  anbi12d(hs1 = c2, (c0 ∈(c5 \ c3)∧ hs1 ∈(c5 \ c3)), ∃(s0 ∈ c3, s0 ∈(c0[c4]hs1)), (c0 ∈(c5 \ c3)∧ c2 ∈(c5 \ c3)), ∃(s0 ∈ c3, s0 ∈(c0[c4]c2)))
  anbi2d(hs1 = c2, c0 ∈(c5 \ c3), hs1 ∈(c5 \ c3), c2 ∈(c5 \ c3))
  eleq1(hs1, c2, (c5 \ c3))
  rexbidv(s0, c3, hs1 = c2, s0 ∈(c0[c4]hs1), s0 ∈(c0[c4]c2))
  eleq2d(s0, (c0[c4]hs1), (c0[c4]c2), hs1 = c2)
  oveq2(hs1, c2, c0, c4)
  eqtri(c1, { < hs0, hs1 > |((hs0 ∈(c5 \ c3)∧ hs1 ∈(c5 \ c3))∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c3, s0 ∈(hs0[c4]hs1)))}, { < s1, s2 > |((s1 ∈(c5 \ c3)∧ s2 ∈(c5 \ c3))∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c3, s0 ∈(s1[c4]s2)))})
  cbvopabv(s1, s2, hs0, hs1, ((s1 ∈(c5 \ c3)∧ s2 ∈(c5 \ c3))∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c3, s0 ∈(s1[c4]s2))), ((hs0 ∈(c5 \ c3)∧ hs1 ∈(c5 \ c3))∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c3, s0 ∈(hs0[c4]hs1))))
  anbi12d((s1 = hs0 ∧ s2 = hs1), (s1 ∈(c5 \ c3)∧ s2 ∈(c5 \ c3)), ∃(s0 ∈ c3, s0 ∈(s1[c4]s2)), (hs0 ∈(c5 \ c3)∧ hs1 ∈(c5 \ c3)), ∃(s0 ∈ c3, s0 ∈(hs0[c4]hs1)))
  anbi12d((s1 = hs0 ∧ s2 = hs1), s1 ∈(c5 \ c3), s2 ∈(c5 \ c3), hs0 ∈(c5 \ c3), hs1 ∈(c5 \ c3))
  eleq1d(s1, (c5 \ c3), hs0, (s1 = hs0 ∧ s2 = hs1))
  simpl(s1 = hs0, s2 = hs1)
  eleq1d(s2, (c5 \ c3), hs1, (s1 = hs0 ∧ s2 = hs1))
  simpr(s1 = hs0, s2 = hs1)
  rexbidv(s0, c3, (s1 = hs0 ∧ s2 = hs1), s0 ∈(s1[c4]s2), s0 ∈(hs0[c4]hs1))
  eleq2d(s0, (s1[c4]s2), (hs0[c4]hs1), (s1 = hs0 ∧ s2 = hs1))
  oveq12(s1, hs0, s2, hs1, c4)
  anbi1d(w0, (¬ c0 ∈ c3 ∧ ¬ c2 ∈ c3), ∃(s0 ∈ c3, s0 ∈(c0[c4]c2)), (c0 ∈(c5 \ c3)∧ c2 ∈(c5 \ c3)))
  anbi12d(w0, ¬ c0 ∈ c3, ¬ c2 ∈ c3, c0 ∈(c5 \ c3), c2 ∈(c5 \ c3))
  syl6bbr(w0, ¬ c0 ∈ c3, c0 ∈(c5 \ c3), (c0 ∈ c5 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ c3))
  biantrurd(w0, ¬ c0 ∈ c3, c0 ∈ c5)
  eldif(c0, c5, c3)
  syl6bbr(w0, ¬ c2 ∈ c3, c2 ∈(c5 \ c3), (c2 ∈ c5 ∧ ¬ c2 ∈ c3))
  biantrurd(w0, ¬ c2 ∈ c3, c2 ∈ c5)
  eldif(c2, c5, c3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(((c0 ∈(c5 \ c3)∧ c2 ∈(c5 \ c3))∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c3, s0 ∈(c0[c4]c2))))
  diff.hs1.w(((c0 ∈(c5 \ c3)∧ c2 ∈(c5 \ c3))∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c3, s0 ∈(c0[c4]c2))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s1, (hs0 ∈(c5 \ c3)∧ hs1 ∈(c5 \ c3)), ∃(s0 ∈ c3, s0 ∈(hs0[c4]hs1)))
  diff.wa.s(s1, hs0 ∈(c5 \ c3), hs1 ∈(c5 \ c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, hs0, (c5 \ c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, hs1, (c5 \ c3))
  diff.cdif.s(s1, c5, c3)
  diff.wrex.s(s1, s0, c3, s0 ∈(hs0[c4]hs1))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, (hs0[c4]hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, hs0, c4, hs1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)

  axtgbtwnid(c0, cv(s2), c2, c3, c4, c5, wa(wa(wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(s2), c7)), wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c5, c1))))
  ad3antrrr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s2), c7), wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c5, c1)), wcel(c0, c2))
  tglnpt(cv(s2), c2, c3, c8, c5, c7, wa(wa(wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(s2), c7)), wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c5, c1))))
  ad3antrrr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s2), c7), wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c5, c1)), wcel(c3, cstrkg))
  ad3antrrr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s2), c7), wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c5, c1)), wcel(c7, crn(c8)))
  eleqtrrd(cv(s2), co(c0, c5, c0), co(c0, c5, c1), wa(wa(wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(s2), c7)), wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c5, c1))))
  simpr(wa(wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(s2), c7)), wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c5, c1)))
  oveq2d(c0, c5, c0, c1, wa(wa(wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(s2), c7)), wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c5, c1))))
  simpllr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s2), c7), wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c5, c1)))
  simplr(wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(s2), c7), wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c5, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wrex(s2, c7, wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c5, c1))))
  simprd(w0, wrex(s2, c7, wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c5, c1))), wa(wn(wcel(c0, c7)), wn(wcel(c1, c7))))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wa(wn(wcel(c0, c7)), wn(wcel(c1, c7))), wrex(s2, c7, wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c5, c1)))), wbr(c0, c6, c1))
  islnopp(s2, s0, s1, c0, c6, c1, c7, c5, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.wceq.s(s2, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c0, c7)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

thm oppne3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ≠ c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)
  ⊣ c4 =(dist ` c3)
  ⊣ c5 =(Itv ` c3)
  ⊣ c6 = { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈(c2 \ c7)∧ s1 ∈(c2 \ c7))∧ ∃(s2 ∈ c7, s2 ∈(s0[c5]s1)))}
  ⊣ c8 =(LineG ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c7 ∈ ran(c8))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[c6]c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c7)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c7)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
  ⊣ d(s2, c5)
  ⊣ d(s2, c6)
  ⊣ d(s2, c7)
  ⊣ d(s2, c8)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  neqned(c0, c1, w0)
  mtand(w0, c0 = c1, c0 ∈ c7)
  oppne1(s0, s1, s2, c0, c7, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c8, c1, w0)
  r19.29a(s2, c7, (w0 ∧ c0 = c1), c0 ∈ c7, s2 ∈(c0[c5]c1))
  eqeltrd(c0, c7, s2, (((w0 ∧ c0 = c1)∧ s2 ∈ c7)∧ s2 ∈(c0[c5]c1)))
  axtgbtwnid(c0, s2, c2, c3, c4, c5, (((w0 ∧ c0 = c1)∧ s2 ∈ c7)∧ s2 ∈(c0[c5]c1)))
  ad3antrrr(w0, c0 = c1, s2 ∈ c7, s2 ∈(c0[c5]c1), c0 ∈ c2)
  tglnpt(s2, c2, c3, c8, c5, c7, (((w0 ∧ c0 = c1)∧ s2 ∈ c7)∧ s2 ∈(c0[c5]c1)))
  ad3antrrr(w0, c0 = c1, s2 ∈ c7, s2 ∈(c0[c5]c1), c3 ∈ TarskiG)
  ad3antrrr(w0, c0 = c1, s2 ∈ c7, s2 ∈(c0[c5]c1), c7 ∈ ran(c8))
  eleqtrrd(s2, (c0[c5]c0), (c0[c5]c1), (((w0 ∧ c0 = c1)∧ s2 ∈ c7)∧ s2 ∈(c0[c5]c1)))
  simpr(((w0 ∧ c0 = c1)∧ s2 ∈ c7), s2 ∈(c0[c5]c1))
  oveq2d(c0, c5, c0, c1, (((w0 ∧ c0 = c1)∧ s2 ∈ c7)∧ s2 ∈(c0[c5]c1)))
  simpllr(w0, c0 = c1, s2 ∈ c7, s2 ∈(c0[c5]c1))
  simplr((w0 ∧ c0 = c1), s2 ∈ c7, s2 ∈(c0[c5]c1))
  adantr(w0, c0 = c1, ∃(s2 ∈ c7, s2 ∈(c0[c5]c1)))
  simprd(w0, ∃(s2 ∈ c7, s2 ∈(c0[c5]c1)), (¬ c0 ∈ c7 ∧ ¬ c1 ∈ c7))
  mpbid(w0, ((¬ c0 ∈ c7 ∧ ¬ c1 ∈ c7)∧ ∃(s2 ∈ c7, s2 ∈(c0[c5]c1))), c0[c6]c1)
  islnopp(s2, s0, s1, c0, c6, c1, c7, c5, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, c0 = c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c0, c7)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: oppcom
blocks.content: Commutativity rule for "opposite" Theorem 9.2 of [Schwabhauser] p. 67. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm oppcom(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cds, c4))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(citv, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c3, c7)), wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c3, c7))), wrex(s2, c7, wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(clng, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, crn(c8)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, c1, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c7)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c6)
  -| diffsc(s2, c7)
  -| diffsc(s2, c8)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2)), diffsc(s2, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2)), diffsc(s2, c3))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2)), diffsc(s2, c4))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2)), diffsc(s2, c5))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2)), diffsc(s2, c6))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2)), diffsc(s2, c7))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2)), diffsc(s2, c8))
  mpbird(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2), wa(wa(wn(wcel(c0, c7)), wn(wcel(c2, c7))), wrex(s2, c7, wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c6, c2)))))
  jca31(w0, wn(wcel(c0, c7)), wn(wcel(c2, c7)), wrex(s2, c7, wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c6, c2))))
  simprd(w0, wn(wcel(c0, c7)), wn(wcel(c2, c7)))
  simpld(w0, wn(wcel(c2, c7)), wn(wcel(c0, c7)))
  simpld(w0, wa(wn(wcel(c2, c7)), wn(wcel(c0, c7))), wrex(s2, c7, wcel(cv(s2), co(c2, c6, c0))))
  mpbid(w0, wrex(s2, c7, wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c6, c2))), wrex(s2, c7, wcel(cv(s2), co(c2, c6, c0))))
  simprd(w0, wrex(s2, c7, wcel(cv(s2), co(c2, c6, c0))), wa(wn(wcel(c2, c7)), wn(wcel(c0, c7))))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wa(wn(wcel(c2, c7)), wn(wcel(c0, c7))), wrex(s2, c7, wcel(cv(s2), co(c2, c6, c0)))), wbr(c2, c1, c0))
  islnopp(s2, s0, s1, c2, c1, c0, c7, c6, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  rexbidva(s2, c7, w0, wcel(cv(s2), co(c2, c6, c0)), wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c6, c2)))
  impbida(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c7)), wcel(cv(s2), co(c2, c6, c0)), wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c6, c2)))
  tgbtwncom(cv(s2), c0, c6, c2, c3, c4, c5, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c7)), wcel(cv(s2), co(c2, c6, c0))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c7), wcel(cv(s2), co(c2, c6, c0)), wcel(c4, cstrkg))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c7), wcel(cv(s2), co(c2, c6, c0)), wcel(c2, c3))
  adantr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c7)), wcel(cv(s2), co(c2, c6, c0)), wcel(cv(s2), c3))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c7), wcel(cv(s2), co(c2, c6, c0)), wcel(c0, c3))
  simpr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c7)), wcel(cv(s2), co(c2, c6, c0)))
  tgbtwncom(cv(s2), c2, c6, c0, c3, c4, c5, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c7)), wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c6, c2))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c7), wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c6, c2)), wcel(c4, cstrkg))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c7), wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c6, c2)), wcel(c0, c3))
  adantr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c7)), wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c6, c2)), wcel(cv(s2), c3))
  tglnpt(cv(s2), c3, c4, c8, c6, c7, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c7)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c7), wcel(c4, cstrkg))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c7), wcel(c7, crn(c8)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c7))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c7), wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c6, c2)), wcel(c2, c3))
  simpr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c7)), wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c6, c2)))
  islnopp(s2, s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c7, c6, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

thm oppcom(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[c1]c2)
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ⊣ c5 =(dist ` c4)
  ⊣ c6 =(Itv ` c4)
  ⊣ c1 = { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈(c3 \ c7)∧ s1 ∈(c3 \ c7))∧ ∃(s2 ∈ c7, s2 ∈(s0[c6]s1)))}
  ⊣ c8 =(LineG ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c7 ∈ ran(c8))
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2[c1]c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, c7)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c6)
  ⊣ d(s1, c7)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
  ⊣ d(s2, c5)
  ⊣ d(s2, c6)
  ⊣ d(s2, c7)
  ⊣ d(s2, c8)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → c0[c1]c2), d(s2, c1))
  a1ii((w0 → c0[c1]c2), d(s2, c3))
  a1ii((w0 → c0[c1]c2), d(s2, c4))
  a1ii((w0 → c0[c1]c2), d(s2, c5))
  a1ii((w0 → c0[c1]c2), d(s2, c6))
  a1ii((w0 → c0[c1]c2), d(s2, c7))
  a1ii((w0 → c0[c1]c2), d(s2, c8))
  mpbird(w0, c0[c1]c2, ((¬ c0 ∈ c7 ∧ ¬ c2 ∈ c7)∧ ∃(s2 ∈ c7, s2 ∈(c0[c6]c2))))
  jca31(w0, ¬ c0 ∈ c7, ¬ c2 ∈ c7, ∃(s2 ∈ c7, s2 ∈(c0[c6]c2)))
  simprd(w0, ¬ c0 ∈ c7, ¬ c2 ∈ c7)
  simpld(w0, ¬ c2 ∈ c7, ¬ c0 ∈ c7)
  simpld(w0, (¬ c2 ∈ c7 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ c7), ∃(s2 ∈ c7, s2 ∈(c2[c6]c0)))
  mpbid(w0, ∃(s2 ∈ c7, s2 ∈(c0[c6]c2)), ∃(s2 ∈ c7, s2 ∈(c2[c6]c0)))
  simprd(w0, ∃(s2 ∈ c7, s2 ∈(c2[c6]c0)), (¬ c2 ∈ c7 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ c7))
  mpbid(w0, ((¬ c2 ∈ c7 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ c7)∧ ∃(s2 ∈ c7, s2 ∈(c2[c6]c0))), c2[c1]c0)
  islnopp(s2, s0, s1, c2, c1, c0, c7, c6, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  rexbidva(s2, c7, w0, s2 ∈(c2[c6]c0), s2 ∈(c0[c6]c2))
  impbida((w0 ∧ s2 ∈ c7), s2 ∈(c2[c6]c0), s2 ∈(c0[c6]c2))
  tgbtwncom(s2, c0, c6, c2, c3, c4, c5, ((w0 ∧ s2 ∈ c7)∧ s2 ∈(c2[c6]c0)))
  ad2antrr(w0, s2 ∈ c7, s2 ∈(c2[c6]c0), c4 ∈ TarskiG)
  ad2antrr(w0, s2 ∈ c7, s2 ∈(c2[c6]c0), c2 ∈ c3)
  adantr((w0 ∧ s2 ∈ c7), s2 ∈(c2[c6]c0), s2 ∈ c3)
  ad2antrr(w0, s2 ∈ c7, s2 ∈(c2[c6]c0), c0 ∈ c3)
  simpr((w0 ∧ s2 ∈ c7), s2 ∈(c2[c6]c0))
  tgbtwncom(s2, c2, c6, c0, c3, c4, c5, ((w0 ∧ s2 ∈ c7)∧ s2 ∈(c0[c6]c2)))
  ad2antrr(w0, s2 ∈ c7, s2 ∈(c0[c6]c2), c4 ∈ TarskiG)
  ad2antrr(w0, s2 ∈ c7, s2 ∈(c0[c6]c2), c0 ∈ c3)
  adantr((w0 ∧ s2 ∈ c7), s2 ∈(c0[c6]c2), s2 ∈ c3)
  tglnpt(s2, c3, c4, c8, c6, c7, (w0 ∧ s2 ∈ c7))
  adantr(w0, s2 ∈ c7, c4 ∈ TarskiG)
  adantr(w0, s2 ∈ c7, c7 ∈ ran(c8))
  simpr(w0, s2 ∈ c7)
  ad2antrr(w0, s2 ∈ c7, s2 ∈(c0[c6]c2), c2 ∈ c3)
  simpr((w0 ∧ s2 ∈ c7), s2 ∈(c0[c6]c2))
  islnopp(s2, s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c7, c6, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: opptgdim2
blocks.content: If two points opposite to a line exist, dimension must be 2 or more. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Mar-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm opptgdim2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cstrkgld, nat2))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cds, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(citv, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c1, c5)), wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c1, c5))), wrex(s2, c5, wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(clng, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, crn(c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c8, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c7, c4, c8))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c6)
  -| diffsc(s2, c7)
  -| diffsc(s2, c8)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  r19.29vva(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, w0, wbr(c0, cstrkgld, nat2), wa(wceq(c5, co(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1))), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  ncoltgdim2(c0, c1, c6, c3, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c7, wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wa(wceq(c5, co(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1))), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  ad3antrrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wa(wceq(c5, co(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1))), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wcel(c0, cstrkg))
  simpllr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wa(wceq(c5, co(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1))), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  simplr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wa(wceq(c5, co(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1))), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  ad3antrrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wa(wceq(c5, co(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1))), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wcel(c7, c1))

  neleqtrd(c7, (hs0[c6]hs1), c5, (((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)∧ hs1 ∈ c1)∧(c5 =(hs0[c6]hs1)∧ hs0 ≠ hs1)))

blocks.name: oppnid
blocks.content: The "opposite to a line" relation is irreflexive. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Mar-2020.)

thm oppnid(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wn(wbr(c0, c1, c0)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cds, c3))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c3))
  -| wceq(c1, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c2, c6)), wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c2, c6))), wrex(s2, c6, wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(clng, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, crn(c7)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c6)
  -| diffsc(s2, c7)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wn(wbr(c0, c1, c0))), diffsc(s2, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wn(wbr(c0, c1, c0))), diffsc(s2, c3))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wn(wbr(c0, c1, c0))), diffsc(s2, c4))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wn(wbr(c0, c1, c0))), diffsc(s2, c5))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wn(wbr(c0, c1, c0))), diffsc(s2, c7))
  pm2.65da(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c0), wcel(c0, c6))
  r19.29a(s2, c6, wa(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c0)), wcel(c0, c6), wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c5, c0)))
  eqeltrd(c0, c6, cv(s2), wa(wa(wa(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c0)), wcel(cv(s2), c6)), wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c5, c0))))
  axtgbtwnid(c0, cv(s2), c2, c3, c4, c5, wa(wa(wa(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c0)), wcel(cv(s2), c6)), wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c5, c0))))
  ad3antrrr(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c0), wcel(cv(s2), c6), wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c5, c0)), wcel(c0, c2))
  tglnpt(cv(s2), c2, c3, c7, c5, c6, wa(wa(wa(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c0)), wcel(cv(s2), c6)), wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c5, c0))))
  ad3antrrr(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c0), wcel(cv(s2), c6), wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c5, c0)), wcel(c3, cstrkg))
  ad3antrrr(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c0), wcel(cv(s2), c6), wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c5, c0)), wcel(c6, crn(c7)))
  simpr(wa(wa(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c0)), wcel(cv(s2), c6)), wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c5, c0)))
  simplr(wa(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c0)), wcel(cv(s2), c6), wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c5, c0)))

  ⊣ c7 =(LineG ` c3)

  axtgbtwnid(c0, s2, c2, c3, c4, c5, (((w0 ∧ c0[c1]c0)∧ s2 ∈ c6)∧ s2 ∈(c0[c5]c0)))
  ad3antrrr(w0, c0[c1]c0, s2 ∈ c6, s2 ∈(c0[c5]c0), c0 ∈ c2)
  tglnpt(s2, c2, c3, c7, c5, c6, (((w0 ∧ c0[c1]c0)∧ s2 ∈ c6)∧ s2 ∈(c0[c5]c0)))
  ad3antrrr(w0, c0[c1]c0, s2 ∈ c6, s2 ∈(c0[c5]c0), c3 ∈ TarskiG)
  ad3antrrr(w0, c0[c1]c0, s2 ∈ c6, s2 ∈(c0[c5]c0), c6 ∈ ran(c7))
  simpr(((w0 ∧ c0[c1]c0)∧ s2 ∈ c6), s2 ∈(c0[c5]c0))
  simplr((w0 ∧ c0[c1]c0), s2 ∈ c6, s2 ∈(c0[c5]c0))
  simplbda(w0, c0[c1]c0, ∃(s2 ∈ c6, s2 ∈(c0[c5]c0)), (¬ c0 ∈ c6 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ c6))
  simpld((w0 ∧ c0[c1]c0), ¬ c0 ∈ c6, ¬ c0 ∈ c6)

blocks.name: oppperpex
blocks.content: Restating ~ colperpex using the "opposite side of a line" relation. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 2-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: opphl
blocks.content: If two points ` A ` and ` C ` lie on the opposite side of a line ` D ` then any point of the half line ( ` R ` ` A ` ) also lies opposite to ` C ` . Theorem 9.5 of [Schwabhauser] p. 69. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Mar-2019.)

blocks.name: outpasch
blocks.content: Axiom of Pasch, outer form. This was proven by Gupta from other axioms and is therefore presented as Theorem 9.6 in [Schwabhauser] p. 70. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: hlpasch
blocks.content: An application of the axiom of Pasch for half-lines. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm hlpasch(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wbr(c1, cfv(c2, c3), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c4, c5, c6)))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c7))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c7))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(chlg, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c8, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c8, cfv(c2, c3), c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(c4, c5, c8)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpjaodan(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wbr(c1, cfv(c2, c3), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c4, c5, c6)))), wcel(c8, co(c3, c5, c6)), wcel(c6, co(c3, c5, c8)))
  mpd(wa(w0, wcel(c8, co(c3, c5, c6))), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wbr(c1, cfv(c2, c3), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c4, c5, c6)))), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c6, c5, c4)), wcel(c1, co(c3, c5, cv(s0))))))
  outpasch(s0, c0, c6, c5, c4, c1, c3, c7, cfv(clng, c7), c8, wa(w0, wcel(c8, co(c3, c5, c6))))

  adantr(w0, wcel(c8, co(c3, c5, c6)), wcel(c8, c0))

  adantr(w0, wcel(c8, co(c3, c5, c6)), wcel(c1, co(c4, c5, c8)))
  reximdva(s0, c0, wa(w0, wcel(c8, co(c3, c5, c6))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c6, c5, c4)), wcel(c1, co(c3, c5, cv(s0)))), wa(wbr(c1, cfv(c2, c3), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c4, c5, c6))))
  ex(wa(wa(w0, wcel(c8, co(c3, c5, c6))), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c6, c5, c4)), wcel(c1, co(c3, c5, cv(s0)))), wa(wbr(c1, cfv(c2, c3), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c4, c5, c6))))
  jca(wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(c8, co(c3, c5, c6))), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c6, c5, c4)), wcel(c1, co(c3, c5, cv(s0))))), wbr(c1, cfv(c2, c3), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c4, c5, c6)))
  btwnhl2(c1, c2, c3, cv(s0), c0, c7, c5, c1, wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(c8, co(c3, c5, c6))), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c6, c5, c4)), wcel(c1, co(c3, c5, cv(s0))))))
  tgbtwncom(c1, cv(s0), c5, c3, c0, c7, cfv(cds, c7), wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(c8, co(c3, c5, c6))), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c6, c5, c4)), wcel(c1, co(c3, c5, cv(s0))))))
  simprr(wa(wa(w0, wcel(c8, co(c3, c5, c6))), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c6, c5, c4)), wcel(c1, co(c3, c5, cv(s0))))
  neqned(cv(s0), c3, wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(c8, co(c3, c5, c6))), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c6, c5, c4)), wcel(c1, co(c3, c5, cv(s0))))))
  pm2.65da(wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(c8, co(c3, c5, c6))), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c6, c5, c4)), wcel(c1, co(c3, c5, cv(s0))))), wceq(cv(s0), c3), wceq(c1, c3))
  eqcomd(c1, c3, wa(wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(c8, co(c3, c5, c6))), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c6, c5, c4)), wcel(c1, co(c3, c5, cv(s0))))), wceq(cv(s0), c3)))
  axtgbtwnid(c3, c1, c0, c7, cfv(cds, c7), c5, wa(wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(c8, co(c3, c5, c6))), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c6, c5, c4)), wcel(c1, co(c3, c5, cv(s0))))), wceq(cv(s0), c3)))
  adantr(wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(c8, co(c3, c5, c6))), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c6, c5, c4)), wcel(c1, co(c3, c5, cv(s0))))), wceq(cv(s0), c3), wcel(c7, cstrkg))
  adantr(wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(c8, co(c3, c5, c6))), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c6, c5, c4)), wcel(c1, co(c3, c5, cv(s0))))), wceq(cv(s0), c3), wcel(c3, c0))
  ad2antrr(wa(w0, wcel(c8, co(c3, c5, c6))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c6, c5, c4)), wcel(c1, co(c3, c5, cv(s0)))), wcel(c3, c0))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c8, co(c3, c5, c6)), wcel(c3, c0))
  adantr(wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(c8, co(c3, c5, c6))), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c6, c5, c4)), wcel(c1, co(c3, c5, cv(s0))))), wceq(cv(s0), c3), wcel(c1, c0))

blocks.name: chpg
blocks.content: "Belong to the same open half-plane" relation for points in a geometry.
blocks.origin: const class chpg { hpG }

df-hpg
blocks.content: Define the open half plane relation for a geometry ` G ` . Definition 9.7 of [Schwabhauser] p. 71. See ~ hpgbr to find the same formulation. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Mar-2020.)

axiom df-hpg(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, setvar s6, setvar s7) {

blocks.name: hpgbr
blocks.content: Half-planes : property for points ` A ` and ` B ` to belong to the same open half plane delimited by line ` D ` . Definition 9.7 of [Schwabhauser] p. 71. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Mar-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm hpgbr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {

  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(citv, c1))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, crn(c7)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))

  -| diffss(s2, s3)

  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)

  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)

  -| diffsc(s2, c6)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c4)
  -| diffsc(s3, c6)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(cfv(chpg, c1), c2), c3), wrex(s0, c4, wa(wbr(c0, c5, cv(s0)), wbr(c3, c5, cv(s0)))), wbr(c0, copab(hs0, hs1, wrex(s0, c4, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c5, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(hs1), c5, cv(s0))))), c3))

  ishpg(s1, s2, s0, s3, c1, c2, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  cbvopabv(s1, s2, hs0, hs1, wrex(s0, c4, wa(wbr(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), c5, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, c4, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c5, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(hs1), c5, cv(s0)))))
  rexbidv(s0, c4, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs1))), wa(wbr(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), c5, cv(s0))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c5, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(hs1), c5, cv(s0))))

  breq1d(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0), cv(hs0), wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs1))))

  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(c0, copab(hs0, hs1, wrex(s0, c4, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c5, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(hs1), c5, cv(s0))))), c3), wrex(s0, c4, wa(wbr(c0, c5, cv(s0)), wbr(c3, c5, cv(s0))))), wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c3, c4))
  brabga(hs0, hs1, c0, c4, c3, c4, copab(hs0, hs1, wrex(s0, c4, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c5, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(hs1), c5, cv(s0))))), wrex(s0, c4, wa(wbr(c0, c5, cv(s0)), wbr(c3, c5, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, c4, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c5, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(hs1), c5, cv(s0)))))
  rexbidv(s0, c4, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c3)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c5, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(hs1), c5, cv(s0))), wa(wbr(c0, c5, cv(s0)), wbr(c3, c5, cv(s0))))

  breq1d(cv(hs0), c5, cv(s0), c0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c3)))
  simpl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  breq1d(cv(hs1), c5, cv(s0), c3, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c3)))
  simpr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))

blocks.name: lnoppnhpg
blocks.content: If two points lie on the opposite side of a line ` D ` , they are not on the same half-plane. Theorem 9.9 of [Schwabhauser] p. 72. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Mar-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm lnoppnhpg(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wn(wbr(c0, cfv(cfv(chpg, c1), c2), c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c1))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(clng, c1))
  -| wceq(c7, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c4, c2)), wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c4, c2))), wrex(s2, c2, wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, crn(c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c7, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c7)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c6)
  -| diffsc(s2, c7)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  mtbid(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(cfv(chpg, c1), c2), c3), wbr(c3, c7, c3))
  oppnid(s0, s1, s2, c3, c7, c4, c1, cfv(cds, c1), c5, c2, c6, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cds, c1))
  lnopp2hpgb(s0, s1, s2, c3, c7, c3, c0, c1, c2, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cds, c1)
  diff.cds.s(s2)
}

  ⊢ (w0 → ¬ c0[((hpG ` c1)` c2)]c3)
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c1)

} = {

thm hpgtr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(cfv(chpg, c1), c2), c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c1))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(clng, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, crn(c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wceq(c7, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c4, c2)), wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c4, c2))), wrex(s2, c2, wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c8, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(cfv(chpg, c1), c2), c8))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c8, cfv(cfv(chpg, c1), c2), c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c7)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c6)
  -| diffsc(s2, c7)
  -| diffsc(s2, c8)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(cfv(chpg, c1), c2), c3)), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(cfv(chpg, c1), c2), c3)), diffsc(s1, c3))
  mpbird(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(cfv(chpg, c1), c2), c3), wrex(hs0, c4, wa(wbr(c0, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(c3, c7, cv(hs0)))))
  mpd(w0, wrex(hs0, c4, wa(wbr(c0, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(c3, c7, cv(hs0)))), wrex(hs0, c4, wa(wbr(c0, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(c8, c7, cv(hs0)))))
  mpbid(w0, wrex(hs0, c4, wa(wbr(c0, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(c8, c7, cv(hs0)))), wbr(c0, cfv(cfv(chpg, c1), c2), c8))
  hpgbr(hs0, s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c8, c4, c7, c5, c6, w0)
  reximdva(hs0, c4, w0, wa(wbr(c0, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(c8, c7, cv(hs0))), wa(wbr(c0, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(c3, c7, cv(hs0))))
  ex(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wa(wbr(c0, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(c8, c7, cv(hs0))), wa(wbr(c0, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(c3, c7, cv(hs0))))
  jca(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wa(wbr(c0, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(c8, c7, cv(hs0)))), wbr(c0, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(c3, c7, cv(hs0)))
  simprl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wbr(c0, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(c8, c7, cv(hs0)))
  mpbird(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wa(wbr(c0, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(c8, c7, cv(hs0)))), wbr(c3, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(c8, cfv(cfv(chpg, c1), c2), c3))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wa(wbr(c0, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(c8, c7, cv(hs0))), wbr(c8, cfv(cfv(chpg, c1), c2), c3))
  lnopp2hpgb(s0, s1, s2, c3, c7, cv(hs0), c8, c1, c2, c4, c5, c6, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wa(wbr(c0, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(c8, c7, cv(hs0)))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wa(wbr(c0, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(c8, c7, cv(hs0))), wcel(c1, cstrkg))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wa(wbr(c0, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(c8, c7, cv(hs0))), wcel(c2, crn(c6)))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wa(wbr(c0, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(c8, c7, cv(hs0))), wcel(c8, c4))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wa(wbr(c0, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(c8, c7, cv(hs0))), wcel(c3, c4))
  simplr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wa(wbr(c0, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(c8, c7, cv(hs0))))
  simprr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wbr(c0, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(c8, c7, cv(hs0)))
  hpgbr(hs0, s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c7, c5, c6, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c8)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wa(wbr(c0, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(c8, c7, cv(hs0))))
  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(hs0), c4)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wbr(c0, c7, cv(hs0)), wbr(c8, c7, cv(hs0)))
  diff.wbr.s(s2, c0, c7, cv(hs0))
  diff.wbr.s(s2, c8, c7, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

thm hpgtr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[((hpG ` c1)` c2)]c3)
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c1)
  ⊣ c5 =(Itv ` c1)
  ⊣ c6 =(LineG ` c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ran(c6))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ c7 = { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈(c4 \ c2)∧ s1 ∈(c4 \ c2))∧ ∃(s2 ∈ c2, s2 ∈(s0[c5]s1)))}
  ⊣ (w0 → c8 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[((hpG ` c1)` c2)]c8)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c8[((hpG ` c1)` c2)]c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, c7)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c6)
  ⊣ d(s1, c7)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
  ⊣ d(s2, c5)
  ⊣ d(s2, c6)
  ⊣ d(s2, c7)
  ⊣ d(s2, c8)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → c0[((hpG ` c1)` c2)]c3), d(s0, c3))
  a1ii((w0 → c0[((hpG ` c1)` c2)]c3), d(s1, c3))
  mpbird(w0, c0[((hpG ` c1)` c2)]c3, ∃(hs0 ∈ c4,(c0[c7]hs0 ∧ c3[c7]hs0)))
  mpd(w0, ∃(hs0 ∈ c4,(c0[c7]hs0 ∧ c3[c7]hs0)), ∃(hs0 ∈ c4,(c0[c7]hs0 ∧ c8[c7]hs0)))
  mpbid(w0, ∃(hs0 ∈ c4,(c0[c7]hs0 ∧ c8[c7]hs0)), c0[((hpG ` c1)` c2)]c8)
  hpgbr(hs0, s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c8, c4, c7, c5, c6, w0)
  reximdva(hs0, c4, w0, (c0[c7]hs0 ∧ c8[c7]hs0), (c0[c7]hs0 ∧ c3[c7]hs0))
  ex((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c4), (c0[c7]hs0 ∧ c8[c7]hs0), (c0[c7]hs0 ∧ c3[c7]hs0))
  jca(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c4)∧(c0[c7]hs0 ∧ c8[c7]hs0)), c0[c7]hs0, c3[c7]hs0)
  simprl((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c4), c0[c7]hs0, c8[c7]hs0)
  mpbird(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c4)∧(c0[c7]hs0 ∧ c8[c7]hs0)), c3[c7]hs0, c8[((hpG ` c1)` c2)]c3)
  ad2antrr(w0, hs0 ∈ c4, (c0[c7]hs0 ∧ c8[c7]hs0), c8[((hpG ` c1)` c2)]c3)
  lnopp2hpgb(s0, s1, s2, c3, c7, hs0, c8, c1, c2, c4, c5, c6, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c4)∧(c0[c7]hs0 ∧ c8[c7]hs0)))
  ad2antrr(w0, hs0 ∈ c4, (c0[c7]hs0 ∧ c8[c7]hs0), c1 ∈ TarskiG)
  ad2antrr(w0, hs0 ∈ c4, (c0[c7]hs0 ∧ c8[c7]hs0), c2 ∈ ran(c6))
  ad2antrr(w0, hs0 ∈ c4, (c0[c7]hs0 ∧ c8[c7]hs0), c8 ∈ c4)
  ad2antrr(w0, hs0 ∈ c4, (c0[c7]hs0 ∧ c8[c7]hs0), c3 ∈ c4)
  simplr(w0, hs0 ∈ c4, (c0[c7]hs0 ∧ c8[c7]hs0))
  simprr((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c4), c0[c7]hs0, c8[c7]hs0)
  hpgbr(hs0, s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c7, c5, c6, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c8)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s2, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c4), (c0[c7]hs0 ∧ c8[c7]hs0))
  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, hs0 ∈ c4)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, hs0, c4)
  diff.wa.s(s2, c0[c7]hs0, c8[c7]hs0)
  diff.wbr.s(s2, c0, c7, hs0)
  diff.wbr.s(s2, c8, c7, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

blocks.name: colopp
blocks.content: Opposite sides of a line for colinear points. Theorem 9.18 of [Schwabhauser] p. 73. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Aug-2020.)

thm colopp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), w3a(wcel(c3, co(c0, c4, c2)), wn(wcel(c0, c5)), wn(wcel(c2, c5)))))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c7))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(citv, c7))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(clng, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, crn(c8)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c6, c5)), wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c6, c5))), wrex(s2, c5, wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wo(wcel(c3, co(c0, c8, c2)), wceq(c0, c2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c8)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c6)
  -| diffsc(s2, c7)
  -| diffsc(s2, c8)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), w3a(wcel(c3, co(c0, c4, c2)), wn(wcel(c0, c5)), wn(wcel(c2, c5))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), w3a(wcel(c3, co(c0, c4, c2)), wn(wcel(c0, c5)), wn(wcel(c2, c5))))), diffsc(s0, c7))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), w3a(wcel(c3, co(c0, c4, c2)), wn(wcel(c0, c5)), wn(wcel(c2, c5))))), diffsc(s0, c8))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), w3a(wcel(c3, co(c0, c4, c2)), wn(wcel(c0, c5)), wn(wcel(c2, c5))))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), w3a(wcel(c3, co(c0, c4, c2)), wn(wcel(c0, c5)), wn(wcel(c2, c5))))), diffsc(s1, c7))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), w3a(wcel(c3, co(c0, c4, c2)), wn(wcel(c0, c5)), wn(wcel(c2, c5))))), diffsc(s1, c8))
  3bitr4d(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2), w3a(wcel(c3, co(c0, c4, c2)), wn(wcel(c0, c5)), wn(wcel(c2, c5))), wa(wa(wn(wcel(c0, c5)), wn(wcel(c2, c5))), wrex(s2, c5, wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c4, c2)))), wa(wa(wn(wcel(c0, c5)), wn(wcel(c2, c5))), wcel(c3, co(c0, c4, c2))))
  pm5.32da(w0, wa(wn(wcel(c0, c5)), wn(wcel(c2, c5))), wrex(s2, c5, wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c4, c2))), wcel(c3, co(c0, c4, c2)))
  impbida(wa(w0, wa(wn(wcel(c0, c5)), wn(wcel(c2, c5)))), wrex(s2, c5, wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c4, c2))), wcel(c3, co(c0, c4, c2)))
  r19.29a(hs0, c5, wa(wa(w0, wa(wn(wcel(c0, c5)), wn(wcel(c2, c5)))), wrex(s2, c5, wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c4, c2)))), wcel(c3, co(c0, c4, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c4, c2)))
  adantllr(wa(w0, wa(wn(wcel(c0, c5)), wn(wcel(c2, c5)))), wrex(s2, c5, wcel(cv(s2), co(c0, c4, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c4, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c0, c4, c2)))
  eqeltrd(c3, co(c0, c4, c2), cv(hs0), wa(wa(wa(w0, wa(wn(wcel(c0, c5)), wn(wcel(c2, c5)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c4, c2))))
  tglineineq(c3, cv(hs0), c6, c7, c4, c8, co(c0, c8, c2), c5, wa(wa(wa(w0, wa(wn(wcel(c0, c5)), wn(wcel(c2, c5)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c4, c2))))
  tgelrnln(c0, c8, c2, c6, c7, c4, wa(wa(wa(w0, wa(wn(wcel(c0, c5)), wn(wcel(c2, c5)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c4, c2))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wa(w0, wa(wn(wcel(c0, c5)), wn(wcel(c2, c5)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c4, c2))), wne(co(c0, c8, c2), c5), wcel(c0, co(c0, c8, c2)), wn(wcel(c0, c5)))
  tglinerflx1(c0, c8, c2, c6, c7, c4, wa(wa(wa(w0, wa(wn(wcel(c0, c5)), wn(wcel(c2, c5)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c4, c2))))
  simpld(wa(wa(wa(w0, wa(wn(wcel(c0, c5)), wn(wcel(c2, c5)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c4, c2))), wn(wcel(c0, c5)), wn(wcel(c2, c5)))
  nelne1(c0, co(c0, c8, c2), c5)
  elind(c3, co(c0, c8, c2), c5, wa(wa(wa(w0, wa(wn(wcel(c0, c5)), wn(wcel(c2, c5)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c4, c2))))
  mpd(wa(wa(wa(w0, wa(wn(wcel(c0, c5)), wn(wcel(c2, c5)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c4, c2))), wcel(c3, co(c0, c8, c2)), wn(wceq(c0, c2)))
  neneqd(c0, c2, wa(wa(wa(w0, wa(wn(wcel(c0, c5)), wn(wcel(c2, c5)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c4, c2))))
  ad3antrrr(w0, wa(wn(wcel(c0, c5)), wn(wcel(c2, c5))), wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c4, c2)), wi(wn(wceq(c0, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c0, c8, c2))))
  ord(w0, wceq(c0, c2), wcel(c3, co(c0, c8, c2)))
  orcomd(w0, wceq(c0, c2), wcel(c3, co(c0, c8, c2)))
  ad3antrrr(w0, wa(wn(wcel(c0, c5)), wn(wcel(c2, c5))), wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c4, c2)), wcel(c3, c5))
  elind(cv(hs0), co(c0, c8, c2), c5, wa(wa(wa(w0, wa(wn(wcel(c0, c5)), wn(wcel(c2, c5)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c4, c2))))
  btwnlng1(cv(hs0), c0, c8, c2, c6, c7, c4, wa(wa(wa(w0, wa(wn(wcel(c0, c5)), wn(wcel(c2, c5)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c4, c2))))

blocks.content: Half-plane relation for colinear points. Theorem 9.19 of [Schwabhauser] p. 73. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Aug-2020.)

  adantr(w0, c0[((hpG ` c1)` c2)]c3, c1 ∈ TarskiG)
  adantr(w0, c0[((hpG ` c1)` c2)]c3, c2 ∈ ran(c8))
  adantr(w0, c0[((hpG ` c1)` c2)]c3, c0 ∈ c6)
  adantr(w0, c0[((hpG ` c1)` c2)]c3, c3 ∈ c6)
  simpr(w0, c0[((hpG ` c1)` c2)]c3)
  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, ¬ c0 ∈ c2)
  diff.wn.s(s2, c0 ∈ c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c0, c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ((pInvG ` c1)` c5), c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, (pInvG ` c1), c5)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cmir, c1)
  diff.cmir.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, ((pInvG ` c1)` c5), c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, (pInvG ` c1), c5)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cmir, c1)
  diff.cmir.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c5, (c0[c7](((pInvG ` c1)` c5)` c0)))
  diff.co.s(s2, c0, c7, (((pInvG ` c1)` c5)` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s2, ((pInvG ` c1)` c5), c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, (pInvG ` c1), c5)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cmir, c1)
  diff.cmir.s(s2)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, c0[((hpG ` c1)` c2)]c3)
  diff.wbr.s(s2, c0, ((hpG ` c1)` c2), c3)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, (hpG ` c1), c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, chpg, c1)
  diff.chpg.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: hphl
blocks.content: If two points are on the same half-line with endpoint on a line, they are on the same half-plane defined by this line. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm hphl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(cfv(chpg, c1), c2), c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c1))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(clng, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, crn(c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, c4))
  -| wceq(c8, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c4, c2)), wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c4, c2))), wrex(s2, c2, wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c9, cfv(chlg, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c0, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(c9, c7), c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c8)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c6)
  -| diffsc(s2, c7)
  -| diffsc(s2, c8)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(cfv(chpg, c1), c2), c3)), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(cfv(chpg, c1), c2), c3)), diffsc(s1, c3))
  mpbir2and(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(cfv(chpg, c1), c2), c3), wbr(c0, cfv(c9, c7), c3), wn(wcel(c0, c2)))
  colhp(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, c9, c7, c4, c5, c6, c8, w0)
  colrot2(c7, c0, c6, c3, c4, c1, c5, w0)
  orcd(w0, wcel(c0, co(c3, c6, c7)), wceq(c3, c7))
  hlln(c0, c3, c6, c7, c4, c1, c5, c9, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hphl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[((hpG ` c1)` c2)]c3)
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c1)
  ⊣ c5 =(Itv ` c1)
  ⊣ c6 =(LineG ` c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ran(c6))
  ⊣ (w0 → c7 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ c8 = { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈(c4 \ c2)∧ s1 ∈(c4 \ c2))∧ ∃(s2 ∈ c2, s2 ∈(s0[c5]s1)))}
  ⊣ c9 =(hlG ` c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c7 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → ¬ c0 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[(c9 ` c7)]c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, c7)
  ⊣ d(s0, c8)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c6)
  ⊣ d(s1, c7)
  ⊣ d(s1, c8)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
  ⊣ d(s2, c5)
  ⊣ d(s2, c6)
  ⊣ d(s2, c7)
  ⊣ d(s2, c8)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → c0[((hpG ` c1)` c2)]c3), d(s0, c3))
  a1ii((w0 → c0[((hpG ` c1)` c2)]c3), d(s1, c3))
  mpbir2and(w0, c0[((hpG ` c1)` c2)]c3, c0[(c9 ` c7)]c3, ¬ c0 ∈ c2)
  colhp(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, c9, c7, c4, c5, c6, c8, w0)
  colrot2(c7, c0, c6, c3, c4, c1, c5, w0)
  orcd(w0, c0 ∈(c3[c6]c7), c3 = c7)
  hlln(c0, c3, c6, c7, c4, c1, c5, c9, w0)
}
